title: Political leaders dealing with a violent past
title_page: Political leaders dealing with a violent past - BBC News
maintext: Although those talks are most unlikely to conclude with a deal - the numbers simply aren't there - the last thing she needed was another controversy about the IRA, also known as "the Ra".
